title: Video: Youth Lagoon – The Hunt (Deer Lodge Session)
body:
Despite never having stepped foot in Boise, it’s one of my favourite cities in the world.

With what appeared to be a fantastic festival earlier in the year in the form of [Treefort](http://treefortmusicfest.com/) alongside a plethora of simply beautiful music emanating from the city of trees, it’s already become a lifetime goal of mine to visit the Idaho capital. This live session featuring **Youth Lagoon** shot by new unique visual experience website [Deer Lodge](http://deerlodge.fm/) further cements my belief that there’s something rather special about Boise, setting **Trevor Powers** against a scintillating backdrop of flourishing trees and swirling leaves. I’d keep waffling about the transcendental atmosphere and vivid contrast between the music and the environment, but [Deer Lodge](http://deerlodge.fm/) and **Powers** put it best:

_“It was a warm October day. We spent the day driving on dirt trails, commenting on Idaho’s beauty and how it’s scenery to most is practically unknown. We parked the cars near a stream and Powers set foot into the woods, keyboard in hand._

_**“It makes me think of when the artist first started writing that song,”** he said when discussing his view on intimate, bare sessions. **“For me, this is how the song basically started before adding any production on top. It means something.”**_”

Check out **Youth Lagoon** performing _The Hunt_ for [Deer Lodge](http://deerlodge.fm/) below, and follow the website via their [Facebook](http://www.facebook.com/deerlodgefm) page.

[Youth Lagoon: “The Hunt”](http://vimeo.com/39778838) from [Deer Lodge](http://vimeo.com/deerlodge) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).

Via [Deer Lodge](http://deerlodge.fm/watch-youth-lagoon-perform-the-hunt/)
